attributes.additional_details: Because it was amazing and quite frankly they have no reason to not start doing them again.
attributes.background: Bring it back. When lockdown first begun McDonald’s took away one of its most favoured item, the breakfast wrap. I want it back as do many others.

rejection.details: Decisions about what products to sell in McDonalds venues are a matter for McDonalds, not the Government or House of Commons.
